summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to renovation, improvements to, and replacement of City facilities; finding that the Engineering Traffic Building project has been completed; abandoning the unexpended and unencumbered project balance therefor in the City Facilities Renovation and Improvement Construction Fund for that project; authorizing acquisition of and improvements to a replacement facility for the Engineering Warehouse, and making appropriations from the City Facilities Renovation and Improvement Construction Fund and from the Cumulative Reserve Fund for replacement of the Engineering Warehouse.
